SELECT t.id, t.title, t.nid, t.pid, t.path, t.sort from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where t.state = true and t.grade = 1
and o.operator_id = #{operatorId}

SELECT t.code from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where t.state = true and t.grade = 2
and o.operator_id = #{operatorId}

from sys_menu t LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu s on t.id = s.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role o on s.role_id = o.role_id where o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and t.state = true
select id from sys_menu where pid = #{pid} and state = true order by id desc limit 1
